Translations.Text: Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o komurudearou. Sajida suru yo, tashika ni kare-ra wa yobikake rarete ita. Sonotoki gotai manzokunanoni (kyohi shita)
Sokode kono o kotoba (kuruan) o kyogidearu to suru mono o ware ni makase yo. Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzukanai homen kara, ippo ichiichi (daraku ni) michibiki
kare-ra o yuyo surudearou. Hontoni ware no keiryaku wa tsuyoku tashikadearu
Soretomo anata ga kare-ra ni hoshu o motome, sore de kare-ra wa futan o kase rareta no ka
Mata yugen-kai ga kare-ra no temoto ni ari, sore de kare-ra wa (sore o) kakikudasu koto ga dekiru no ka
Dakara nintai shite, anata no omo no meirei o mate. Sakana no tomo no yodeatte wa naranai. Kurushi-sa no amari (kare ga) sakenda toki (no yo ni)
Nushi kara no onkei ga kare ni tasshinakattanaraba, kare wa tsumi o owasa re, fumenboku ni fumonochi ni suteraretadearou
Kono yo ni omo wa, kare o erabi seigi no to no hitori to nasa reta
Fushinjin-sha wa keikoku o kiku toki, sono (monosugoi) metsuki de, anata o å‡¡ Ndo taoren bakari ni suru. Kare-ra wa iu. `Hontoni kare wa tsuka reta monodesu
Daga, kono (kuruan) koso wa, ban'yu no tame no kunkai nihokanaranai
tashikana shinjitsu to wa nani ka
Tashikana shinjitsu ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Samudo to ado (no min) wa, totsuzen kuru saiyaku o kyogidearu to shita
Sore de samudo wa raiun no arashi ni yotte horobosa reta
Mata ado wa unari kuruu kaze ni yotte horobosa reta
Yoru 8-nichi ni watari, kare-ra ni taishi taema naku (arashi ga) osoi, sore de kuchita natsumeyashi no ki no yo ni,(subete no) min ga soko ni taorete iru no o, anata wa mitadearou
Sorede anata wa, kare-ra no naka, dare ka nokotte iru mono o miru no ka
